sealed class Screen(val route: String) { object Dashboard : Screen("dashboard") object SubmitStandup : Screen("submit_standup") object History : Screen("history") object Settings : Screen("settings") }

package com.example.logger.domain.model
data class Standup( val id: String, val name: String, val yesterday: String, val today: String, val blockers: String?, val time: String, val editedAt: String? )
data class StandupDay( val date: String, val roster: List<String>, val submissions: List<Standup> )

package com.example.standuplogger.presentation.navigation
sealed class Screen(val route: String) { object Dashboard : Screen("dashboard") object SubmitStandup : Screen("submit_standup") object History : Screen("history") object Settings : Screen("settings") }

<resources> <string name="app_name">Logger</string> <string name="splash_title">Daily Standup</string> <string name="splash_subtitle">Keep your team in sync with daily updates and track progress effortlessly.</string> <string name="splash_get_started">Get Started</string> <string name="splash_configure_settings">Configure Settings</string> <string name="home">Home</string> <string name="submit">Submit</string> <string name="history">History</string> <string name="settings">Settings</string>

(optional)</string> <string name="required_fields_missing">Please fill all required fields.</string> <string name="unknown_error">Something went wrong.
